description: These roasted turnip wedges make a delicious side dish for roast chicken or any grilled meat.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Halal,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Parmesan Roasted Turnips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g turnips, peeled and chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Add the turnip wedge, olive oil, nutmeg and parmesan to a large bowl and toss well to coat.
Spread the wedges in a single layer on a baking sheet, using a second if necessary, and roast for 30 minutes, flipping halfway through cooking.
